item.title: www.SlayerScape.com - 317 - Full screen - D-claws 100% - and much more [NEW!]
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“kidgoku4522, post:6, topic:509311”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=627558.msg4264704#msg4264704 date=1363898377]

deathlypvpz.com!#!@#!@#!

You hardly ever provide any helpful feedback to any of these threads, if you don’t have something constructive to say; don’t say it at all. If all you’re here to do is put people down every time they show off what they’ve done, no matter how small their effort was, then just leave.

i always do in the downloads section but Not in advertisement…
because I hate when people putting stuff that was already in the server base in the advert thread
Put what you did and i would not be doing it don’t you agree?

Why is server advertisements any different to any other board? If you give constructive criticism elsewhere then give it here. I’ve had several complaints against you lately and it’s starting to annoy me. What does it matter to you if someone is leeching something? If that person released it then people are entitled to leech it. It’s not your problem. Like I said, if you have nothing constructive to say then don’t say it at all.
[/quote]
OMG do I care LOL People getting mad @ posts who gives a #$#@ its a website…[/quote]It’s a website that has structure with the way things are done. Quite frankly, I’m sick of your attitude and if you continue to intentionally flame/spam there will be much more than a warning. I’ve pmed you before about this crap, now stop.

@OP Sorry for all this, and why did you 1hit the player in FunPk…? With dragon claws lol

Read full topic
